scripts.copy: npm run copyBlockSrc & npm run copyPcSubmodule & npm run copyMobileSubmodule
scripts.copyPcSubmodule: npm run copyPcBlockCss & npm run copyPcBlockContents & npm run copyPcCss & npm run copyPcLib & npm run copyPcContents & npm run copyPcFont
scripts.copyPcCss: npx copyfiles -u 3 'public/publish/pc/css/**/*' pc/src/assets/publish & npx copyfiles -a -u 3 public/publish/pc/css/**/* pc/src/assets/publish
scripts.copyPcLib: npx copyfiles -u 3 'public/publish/pc/js/**/*' pc/src/assets/publish & npx copyfiles -a -u 3 public/publish/pc/js/lib/**/* pc/src/assets/publish
scripts.copyPcContents: npx copyfiles -u 3 public/publish/pc/image/common/**/* pc/src/assets/publish & npx copyfiles -u 3 public/publish/pc/image/content/**/* pc/src/assets/publish
scripts.copyPcBlockCss: npx copyfiles -u 3 'public/block/pc/css/**/*' pc/src/assets/publish & npx copyfiles -a -u 3 public/block/pc/css/**/* pc/src/assets/publish
scripts.copyMobileSubmodule: npm run copyMobileBlockCss & npm run copyMobileBlockContents & npm run copyMobileCss & npm run copyMobileContents & npm run copyMobileFont
scripts.copyMobileCss: npx copyfiles -u 3 'public/publish/mobile/css/**/*' mobile/src/assets/publish & npx copyfiles -a -u 3 public/publish/mobile/css/**/* mobile/src/assets/publish
scripts.copyMobileLib: npx copyfiles -u 3 'public/publish/mobile/js/**/*' mobile/src/assets/publish & npx copyfiles -a -u 3 public/publish/mobile/js/lib/**/* mobile/src/assets/publish
scripts.copyMobileContents: npx copyfiles -u 3 public/publish/mobile/image/common/**/* mobile/src/assets/publish & npx copyfiles -u 3 public/publish/mobile/image/content/**/* mobile/src/assets/publish
scripts.copyMobileBlockCss: npx copyfiles -u 3 'public/block/mobile/css/**/*' mobile/src/assets/publish & npx copyfiles -a -u 3 public/block/mobile/css/**/* mobile/src/assets/publish
scripts.copyBlockSrc: npx copyfiles -a -u 3 public/block/src/**/* pc/src/assets/publish/src & npx copyfiles -a -u 3 'public/block/src/**/*' pc/src/assets/publish/src & npx copyfiles -a -u 3 'public/block/src/**/*' mobile/src/assets/publish/src & npx copyfiles -a -u 3 public/block/src/**/* mobile/src/assets/publish/src
